price: 192. Haddayse ka joogaan (xumaha), Alle waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis badan.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
